    "name": "Number of triforces generated at iteration n in a Koch-Sierpi\u0144ski Ninja Star.",
    "comment": [
        "This sequence describes the number of triangles produced in each iteration of the fractal that is generated by nesting two dimensional trees of valency three inside one another geometrically."

        "Refer to the blog link.",
        "Conjecture: a(n) = 2*a(n-1)+3*a(n-2)+3*a(n-3). - _Colin Barker_, Nov 13 2014",
        "Empirical g.f.: -x*(x+1) / (3*x^3+3*x^2+2*x-1). - _Colin Barker_, Nov 13 2014"
